\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 96137}

\subsection*{Crazy Shit }
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Brandon}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1000 mg & oral & Vitamins - Niacin & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 102.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
My friend and I were at a party at my house my other friend walked up asking if we wanted to try this niacin. I was bored so I said yeah. He walked us to the bathroom and he said here take this and I did. I looked at the clock and it was approximately 2:00 pm and by about 3:00 my skin got really hot and itchy. I'm never gonna take that again.
